data.text: @ThisPosable *Somewhere* because don't want to name the platform where I read this. The 2nd time they consulted after returning that they had symptoms,self medicated from the previous prescription without testing and went for the holiday, returned and consulted. TIL about the O2 concentrator

@SatanKiNani Your original tweet mentioned read it somewhere. So it wasn't clear you know them. 

Anyhow that's pretty terrible behaviour risking it for every one.

@ThisPosable I know the family. They got covid twice. Went on holidays in both waves, the second time WHILE symptomatic, they still went to goa. I treated them both the times :) I agree they're going a good deed but I know what caution was followed.

@SatanKiNani Someone going out of the way to buy the equipment preparing for the worst was probably already doing masking etc. We never know their circumstances. 

Anyway they are doing a good thing by god's vibf it away.
@oshowed Mumbai never had this level of bed or oxygen shortage. This is from Mumbai. I know this family but phir bhi karna hai argue to be my guest 👍
@SatanKiNani @oshowed How many people in your circle who followed covid appropriate behavior did not catch covid ?
@SatanKiNani True Dr., could have used that to stock up on N95/KN95/FFP2/KF94 respirators & HEPA air purifiers to improve ventilation!
@SatanKiNani o2 concentrator was need of the hour then ..seemed like a last opportunity to rescue.. don't feel they did anything wrong by buying out of haste. 🙄🤒
